title: Flavio Barros
text:
Flavio Barros Souza (born 23 January 1978) is a Brazilian former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a>.
Flávio previously played for <a href="Clube%20de%20Regatas%20Flamengo">Flamengo</a> in <a href="Campeonato%20Brasileiro%20S%C3%A9rie%20A">Campeonato Brasileiro Série A</a>, <a href="Barcelona%20Sporting%20Club">Barcelona</a> in <a href="Serie%20A%20de%20Ecuador">Serie A de Ecuador</a> and <a href="Club%20Necaxa">Necaxa</a> in the <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20de%20M%C3%A9xico">Primera División de México</a>.
